Name: Clyde River and Batemans Bay Historical Society

About.Hours & facilities:
Opening hours are: 


TUESDAYS & THURSDAYS: 12pm till 3pm and 


SUNDAYS: 2nd, 4th and 5th Sundays of the month; 9am till 12pm

About.Access: Researchers must be voted by Society's Committee to gain access to records. Advance notice required if museum is closed.
